name: Cryptofi
description: About CryptoFi CryptoFi is a play-to-earn NFT game that will allow investors the ability to win coins, participate in many events, and have fun! CryptoFi will combine a fully verifiable blockchain and unlimited earning potential due to decentralized community participation. We expect that blockchain gaming will bring a lot of new users to the crypto space while creating many new jobs and financial benefits, as well as increasing the adoption rate of crypto drastically.
